body: 100yo laws (censoring porn) and no cultural progressivism, classic Japan. But if Japan would try to look at other angles maybe there would be no censoring in porn anymore but this type of loli genre definitely gets banned.

>he still gets bothered by censorship
lmao
Its such a shame when censorship butchers manga like this. I wish Japan would stop this stupid practice but this is how Yakuza and corrupt politicians demand protection money from studios.
